reviews.review_msg: Prefontaine himself is a really nice dude-- he's fun to talk to and genuinely seems to want to teach. He is a TERRIBLE professor-- often goes on tangents in the middle of students' presentations and then omitting marks because students don't present within the alotted times, comes late to his own classes, and provides very poor grading criteria.

I had Dr. Beischlag for my previous HSCI course, and I enjoyed both classes. My final class with him was much more relaxing compared to the other. We had three group presentations and received good grades as long as you put in the effort. He's always available for help and loves to make jokes in class too. Don't be afraid to speak with him!
